SEARCH
Package emissary.directory

Interface IRemoteDirectory

All Superinterfaces:
IDirectoryPlace, IServiceProviderPlace
All Known Implementing Classes:
DirectoryPlace
public interface IRemoteDirectory extends IDirectoryPlace
Interface for inter-directory operations over http These methods are designed to only be called by the remote inter-directory communications layer

  • Nested Class Summary

    Helper class to look up an instance of the local directory cast to this interface if possible

  • Method Details

    • irdAddPlaces

      void irdAddPlaces(List<DirectoryEntry> entryList, boolean propagating)
      Register a set of entries. This signature only meant to be called from within emissary.server.mvc.adapters.DirectoryAdapter.
      Parameters:
      entryList - the new entries to add
      propagating - true if going down the line

    • irdRemovePlaces

      int irdRemovePlaces(List<String> keys, boolean propagating)
      Deregister places. Removes all keys for the specified places. Should only be called from emissary.server.mvc.adapters.DirectoryAdapter
      Parameters:
      keys - four-tuple key for the place
      propagating - true if going down the line
      Returns:
      count of keys removes

    • irdFailDirectory

      int irdFailDirectory(String key, boolean propagating)
      Remove directory
      Parameters:
      key - string key of failed directory
      propagating - true if headed back down the directory chain
      Returns:
      count of how many places were removed locally
